original: @45a / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @45a / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bha ga wa ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya /
analyzed: bha ga wa ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya /
translated: Bhagavatīprajñāpāramitāhṛdaya

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po /
translated: The Heart of the Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā

original: bam po gcig go /
analyzed: bam po gcig go /
translated: One fascicle

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard. At one time,

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
translated: the Bhagavān was dwelling on Vulture Peak in Rājagṛha, together with a great saṅgha of bhikṣus and a great saṅgha of bodhisattvas.

original: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: At that time, the Bhagavān entered the samādhi called Appearance of the Profound and taught the Dharma discourse called Appearance of the Profound.

original: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /
analyzed: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /
translated: while engaging in the practice of the profound perfection of wisdom,

original: phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o //
translated: saw that those five aggregates are also empty by nature.

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
translated: Then, through the Buddha's power,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
translated: the venerable Śāriputra

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to the bodhisattva mahāsattva noble Avalokiteśvara:

original: rigs kyi bu 'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des @45b ji ltar bslab par bya /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des @45b ji ltar bslab par bya /
translated: if a son of noble family or daughter of noble family wishes to engage in the practice of the profound perfection of wisdom, how should they train?

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis che dang ldan ba sha radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis che dang ldan ba sha radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara said this to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra!

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Any son of a good family or🔽daughter of a good family who wishes to practice the profound perfection of wisdom should view it in this way:

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste; phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste; phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su
translated: Those five aggregates should be viewed as empty of intrinsic nature.

original: blta'o // gzugs stong pa'o //
analyzed: blta'o // gzugs stong pa'o //
translated: Form is empty.

original: stong pa nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness is form.

original: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin; stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin; stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Form is not other than emptiness; emptiness is not other than form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o //
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty.🔽“Śāriputra!

original: sh'a ri'i bu; de lta bas na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu; de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
translated: All phenomena are emptiness.

original: mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: They are without defining characteristics.

original: ma skyes pa /🔽ma 'gags pa /🔽dri ma med pa /
analyzed: ma skyes pa / ma 'gags pa / dri ma med pa /
translated: They are unborn.🔽They are unceasing.

original: dri ma dang bral ba med pa /🔽bri ba med pa /
analyzed: dri ma dang bral ba med pa / bri ba med pa /
translated: They are without defilement.🔽They are without separation from defilement.🔽They are without decrease.

original: gang ba med pa'o; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: gang ba med pa'o; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: They are without increase.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Śāriputra, therefore

original: stong pa nyid la gzugs med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gzugs med /
translated: in emptiness there is no form,

original: tshor ba med /
analyzed: tshor ba med /
translated: no feeling,

original: 'du shes med /
analyzed: 'du shes med /
translated: no perception,

original: 'du byed rnams med /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams med /
translated: no formation,

original: rnam par shes pa med /🔽mig med / rna ba med; sna med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med / mig med / rna ba med; sna med /
translated: and no consciousness;🔽no eye, no ear, no nose,

original: lce med / lus med /🔽yid med / gzugs med /🔽sgra med / dri med /
analyzed: lce med / lus med / yid med / gzugs med / sgra med / dri med /
translated: no tongue, no body, no mind;🔽no form, no sound, no smell,

original: ro med / reg bya med /🔽chos med do //
analyzed: ro med / reg bya med / chos med do //
translated: no taste, no texture, no mental object;

original: mig gi khams med pa nas /
analyzed: mig gi khams med pa nas /
translated: no eye element up to and including

original: yid kyi khams @46a *//
analyzed: yid kyi khams @46a *//
translated: no mind element,

original: med; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do //🔽ma rig pa med //
analyzed: med; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do // ma rig pa med //
translated: and no mind consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas /🔽rga shi med /
analyzed: ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas / rga shi med /
translated: There is no ignorance and no exhaustion of ignorance up to

original: rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do //
analyzed: rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do //
translated: no aging and death and no exhaustion of aging and death.

original: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med /
translated: There is no suffering, origin of suffering, cessation of suffering, or path.

original: ye shes med /
analyzed: ye shes med /
translated: There is no wisdom.

original: thob pa med /
analyzed: thob pa med /
translated: There is no attainment.

original: ma thob pa yang med do //
analyzed: ma thob pa yang med do //
translated: There is no non-attainment.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: because bodhisattvas have no attainment,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te /
translated: they rely on and abide in the profound perfection of wisdom.

original: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de /
analyzed: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de /
translated: Since their minds are unobstructed, they are fearless.

original: phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to //
analyzed: phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to //
translated: Having completely transcended error, they reach the culmination of nirvāṇa.

original: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas /
analyzed: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas /
translated: All buddhas dwelling in the three times, too, having relied on the perfection of wisdom,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs ba sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs ba sangs rgyas so //
translated: have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags /
analyzed: de ltar bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags /
translated: Therefore, the mantra of the perfection of wisdom

original: rig pa chen po'i sngags /🔽bla na med pa'i sngags /
analyzed: rig pa chen po'i sngags / bla na med pa'i sngags /
translated: is a great mantra,🔽an unsurpassed mantra,

original: mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sngags /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sngags /
translated: an unequaled mantra,

original: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags /
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags /
translated: a mantra that completely pacifies all suffering.

original: mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste /
translated: It is to be known as true because it is not false.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa /
translated: He spoke the mantra of the perfection of wisdom:

original: tadya th'a / ga te ga te p'a ra ga te /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ga te ga te p'a ra ga te /
translated: Tadyathā: gate gate pāragate

original: p'a ra sam ga te /
analyzed: p'a ra sam ga te /
translated: pārasaṃgate

original: bo dhi sv'ah'a /
analyzed: bo dhi sv'ah'a /
translated: bodhi svāhā.

original: sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: de @46b lta bas na /
analyzed: de @46b lta bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o //
translated: should train in the profound perfection of wisdom in that way.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te /
translated: Then the Blessed One arose from that samādhi

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
translated: and gave his approval to the bodhisattva mahāsattva noble Avalokiteśvara, saying,🔽“Excellent, excellent!

original: legs so // legs so; ;rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: legs so // legs so; ;rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is so,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: son of noble family,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so.

original: ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as you have taught,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste /
translated: the profound perfection of wisdom should be practiced.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: The Tathagatas rejoice in it.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
translated: When the Lord had spoken thus,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: the venerable Śāradvatīputra, the Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara, the entire assembly, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the words of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Sūtra of the Heart of the Perfection of Wisdom of the Venerable Bhagavatī is completed.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing /
translated: Translated by the Indian preceptor Vimalamitra and the Tibetan translator-monk Rinchen-dé.

original: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba dge blo dang / @47a *//🔽nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba dge blo dang / @47a *//🔽nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: Revised by the great translator-editor Géwé Lodrö and Namkha.

original: dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhus dag legs par bgyis so //
analyzed: dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhus dag legs par bgyis so //
translated: It was written on the wall of the Gegyé Jéma temple at glorious Samyé Monastery and was well edited.
